metadata.title: CVE-2024-23722 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In Fluent Bit 2.1.8 through 2.2.1, a NULL pointer dereference can be causedvia an invalid HTTP payload with the content type of x-www-form-urlencoded.It crashes and does not restart. This could result in logs not beingdelivered properly.

criterions.comment: netdata package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
